meanings.definition: Extremely clean or free from dirt or impurities.
meanings.sent1: The kitchen was superclean after my mom spent all day scrubbing it.
meanings.sent2: She always keeps her room superclean, with everything neatly organized.
meanings.sent3: The superclean car was so shiny that it reflected the sunlight like a mirror.
meanings.sent4: Her superclean reputation at work made her the go-to person for important projects.
meanings.sent5: The superclean hospital room gave the patients a sense of comfort and safety.

meanings.sent1: I need to superclean the garage before we can start organizing it.
meanings.sent2: He decided to superclean his car inside out before the road trip.
meanings.sent3: She supercleaned the house so well that even the dust bunnies were impressed.
meanings.sent4: The detective had to superclean the crime scene to gather all the evidence.
meanings.sent5: The maid promised to superclean the hotel room to ensure a pleasant stay for the guests.
